SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.tui

Class TextualUI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.utils.Observable
it.polimi.ingsw.view.VirtualView
it.polimi.ingsw.view.tui.TextualUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
View, Runnable
public class TextualUI extends VirtualView implements View, Runnable
This class represents a textual user interface for the game. It extends the VirtualView class and implements the View and Runnable interfaces.

    Constructs a new instance of the TextualUI class.

  • Constructor Details

    • TextualUI

      public TextualUI()
      Constructs a new instance of the TextualUI class. Initializes the scanner for user input, chat message list, and tile lists.

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      As an implementation of Runnable interface, this method is the entry point of a new thread. It prompts the user to enter their username and validates it. If the entered username is not valid, it keeps prompting until a valid username is entered. Once a valid username is entered, it notifies its observers with a UsernameRequest object and calls inputListener method.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable
      Specified by:
      run in class VirtualView

    • inputListener

      public void inputListener()
      Listens for user input and processes it until the program is terminated. Prompts the user with the ">>>" symbol to indicate that input is expected. The input is passed to the elaborateInput() method for processing.

    • setClientState

      public void setClientState(ClientState clientState)
      Sets the client state
      Parameters:
      clientState - the client state

      public ClientState getClientState()
      Gets the client state.
      Returns:
      the client state

    • onConnectedServerMessage

      public void onConnectedServerMessage(ConnectedToServerMessage connectedToServerMessage)
      This method is invoked when the client successfully connects to the server and receives a ConnectedToServerMessage. It updates the client state and player state accordingly.
      Specified by:
      onConnectedServerMessage in interface View
      Parameters:
      connectedToServerMessage - The message received indicating a successful connection to the server.

    • onCreateLobbyResponse

      public void onCreateLobbyResponse(CreateLobbyResponse createLobbyResponse)
      This method is invoked when the client receives a response to a lobby creation request. It handles the response by printing the result and updating the client state if the lobby creation was successful.
      Specified by:
      onCreateLobbyResponse in interface View
      Parameters:
      createLobbyResponse - The response received for the lobby creation request.

    • onJoinLobbyResponse

      public void onJoinLobbyResponse(JoinLobbyResponse joinLobbyResponse)
      This method is invoked when the client receives a response to a lobby join request. It handles the response by printing the join lobby response content and updating the client state and action type based on the join type. Additionally, it displays the list of lobby players if the join type is "JOINED" or "REJOINED".
      Specified by:
      onJoinLobbyResponse in interface View
      Parameters:
      joinLobbyResponse - The response received for the lobby join request.

    • onLobbyListResponse

      public void onLobbyListResponse(LobbyListResponse lobbyListResponse)
      This method is invoked when the client receives a response containing a list of available lobbies. It handles the response by displaying the list of lobbies using the printer.
      Specified by:
      onLobbyListResponse in interface View
      Parameters:
      lobbyListResponse - The response containing the list of available lobbies.

    • onLoginResponse

      public void onLoginResponse(LoginResponse loginResponse)
      This method is invoked when the client receives a response to a login request. It handles the response by setting the client's username, displaying the username response, and updating the client's action type if the login was successful.
      Specified by:
      onLoginResponse in interface View
      Parameters:
      loginResponse - The response received for the login request.

    • onReconnectionMessage

      public void onReconnectionMessage(ReconnectionMessage reconnectionMessage)
      This method is invoked when the client receives a reconnection message after reconnecting to a game. It handles the message by updating the client state and action type, setting the personal goal card and chat, and displaying the reconnection details using the printer.
      Specified by:
      onReconnectionMessage in interface View
      Parameters:
      reconnectionMessage - The reconnection message received after reconnecting to a game.

    • onUsernameResponse

      Specified by:

      Parameters:

      This method is invoked when the client receives a message indicating that a common goal has been achieved. It handles the message by updating the last received message with the achieved common goal message and displaying the achieved common goal using the printer.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:

    • onAdjacentItemsPointsMessage

      public void onAdjacentItemsPointsMessage(AdjacentItemsPointsMessage adjacentItemsPointsMessage)

It handles the message by updating the last received message with the AdjacentItemsPointsMessage and displaying the points earned using the printer.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:

      public void onDrawInfoMessage(DrawInfoMessage drawInfoMessage)
      This method is invoked when the client receives a draw information message. It handles the message by updating the last received message with the draw information message, displaying the draw information, and setting the action type to "DRAW_TILES".
      Specified by:

    • onEndGameMessage

      public void onEndGameMessage(EndGameMessage endGameMessage)
      This method is invoked when the client receives an end game message indicating the end of the game. It handles the message by updating the last received message with the end game message, displaying the end game ranking using the printer, and setting the client state to "IN_SERVER".
      Specified by:
      onEndGameMessage in interface View
      Parameters:
      endGameMessage - The message indicating the end of the game.

    • onExitGameResponse

      public void onExitGameResponse(ExitGameResponse exitGameResponse)
      This method is invoked when the client receives a response to an exit game request. It handles the response by displaying the exit game response using the printer, setting the client state to "IN_SERVER", and resetting the chat to an empty list.
      Specified by:
      onExitGameResponse in interface View
      Parameters:
      exitGameResponse - The response received for the exit game request.

    • onGameStartedMessage

      public void onGameStartedMessage(GameStartedMessage gameStartedMessage)
      This method is invoked when the client receives a GameStartedMessage indicating the start of a game. It handles the message by updating the last received message with the game started message, setting the client state to "IN_GAME", and displaying the game started details using the printer.
      Specified by:
      onGameStartedMessage in interface View
      Parameters:
      gameStartedMessage - The message indicating the start of the game.

    • onInsertInfoMessage

      public void onInsertInfoMessage(InsertInfoMessage insertInfoMessage)
      This method is invoked when the client receives an InsertInfoMessage. It handles the message by updating the last received message with the insert information message, setting the tiles to insert based on the message's hand, displaying the insert information, and determining the appropriate action type for the client.
      Specified by:
      onInsertInfoMessage in interface View
      Parameters:
      insertInfoMessage - The message containing the insert information.

    • onLastTurnMessage

      Specified by:
      onLastTurnMessage in interface View
      Parameters:

    • onLeaderBoardMessage

      Specified by:

      Parameters:

    • onNewTurnMessage

      public void onNewTurnMessage(NewTurnMessage newTurnMessage)
      This method is invoked when the client receives a NewTurnMessage indicating the start of a new turn. It handles the message by updating the last received message with the new turn message, clearing the tiles to insert and tiles to draw lists, displaying the new turn details using the printer, and setting the action type to "NONE" to indicate no specific action is required from the client.
      Specified by:
      onNewTurnMessage in interface View
      Parameters:
      newTurnMessage - The message indicating the start of a new turn.

    • onNoCommonGoalMessage

      public void onNoCommonGoalMessage(NoCommonGoalMessage noCommonGoalMessage)
      This method is invoked when the client receives a NoCommonGoalMessage indicating that there is no common goal for the current round. It handles the message by updating the last received message with the no common goal message, and printing the message content to the console.
      Specified by:
      onNoCommonGoalMessage in interface View
      Parameters:
      noCommonGoalMessage - The message indicating the absence of a common goal.

    • onExitLobbyResponse

      public void onExitLobbyResponse(ExitLobbyResponse exitLobbyResponse)
      This method is invoked when the client receives an ExitLobbyResponse indicating the response to a request to exit the lobby. It handles the message by displaying the exit lobby response using the printer. If the exit is successful, it clears the chat and sets the client state to ClientState.IN_SERVER.
      Specified by:
      onExitLobbyResponse in interface View
      Parameters:
      exitLobbyResponse - The ExitLobbyResponse containing the response to the exit lobby request.

      onGameNotReadyMessage in interface View
      Parameters:
